speaker: Episode 24 - Petals to the Metal - Chapter Seven
Griffin
lines: Previously, on The Adventure Zone

speaker: Hurley
lines: We’re- we-we’re gonna be the best racers, ever! We’re gonna have the best racing team ever! Magnus, you’re gonna be in charge of security. We’re, we're probably gonna have a lot of boarders, and I’m gonna need you to keep em off the, off the wagon.

speaker: Travis
lines: We're gonna have some hop-ons.

speaker: Hurley
lines: You win a battlewagon race by either finishing first or being the only surviving wagon by the end of the race. Um, so we're gonna need somebody who can assault the other wagons. I just want you up there, flinging your Magic Missiles. Merle, I actually have something I wanna give you. It's, it's a large black metal wrench. It's called the Adamant Spanner. And you're gonna need to use that out on the course if we take too much damage, or you know, a wheel falls off or something like that.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She hands you three the, uh, harnesses.

speaker: Hurley
lines: If you fall off the wagon, these will automatically-

speaker: Travis
lines: [over Griffin] Ugh.

speaker: Hurley
lines: -deploy a bubble around you-

speaker: Griffin
lines: -and she drives into the crate, and the door behind you lifts up and closes.

speaker: Hurley
lines: Remember, we got fifteen opponents, but all we have to do is beat Sloane.

speaker: The Announcer
lines: Get out of my dreams, and into my battlewagon! Hop in the backseat, baby! It's the Adventure Zone!

speaker: [theme music (Déjà Vu by Mort Garson) plays]
Griffin
lines: You hear another horn come from outside and Hurley kicks the engine into gear even before the crate door drops, and suddenly you are blinded by the sun pouring into the crate in which your battlewagon was hiding, and even as your eyes adjust you can't really see much, but you do hear a lot. You hear engines roaring uh even louder now, you hear a dust storm sort of whipping up, ar- around the starting line here, um, and then you start to see bright flashes of light moving between the different battlewagons, and before you can really fully ascertain the situation, the, the three of you are deafened by an explosion about twenty meters to your left, and after that explosion you hear another horn-

speaker: [a second horn sounds in the background]
Griffin
lines: -uh, which seemed to be emanating from these big black pylons. And then-- as soon as the, like, while you're trying to figure that out, two magic missiles fly over the car, nearly missing Taako and a spear flies just directly in front of the car and then Hurley shifts gears, and you are sort of pushed back in your seats by the acceleration, and you seem to be moving away from the pack, and then, uh, as you-- as you sort of pull away a little bit, you hear four more horns sound from the pylons,

speaker: [four shorter and lower horns play in succession as Griffin narrates]
Griffin
lines: and Hurley says, ah,

speaker: Hurley
lines: Every time you hear one of those it means that we've knocked somebody out!

speaker: Griffin
lines: She's like-

speaker: Hurley
lines: We're already- we’re already five down so we're- we’re looking good!

speaker: Magnus
lines: [loudly] What?

speaker: Merle
lines: [loudly] Why are you yelling?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, she's yelling 'cause it's super duper loud. Then you hear her yell-

speaker: Hurley
lines: Damn it!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And as you- you look forward, you see that just a single vehicle, a tri-wheeled almost longboat with these two large black wings sort of splaying off the back, with a single racer, the- the Raven, is really far ahead of you guys. And Hurley shouts,

speaker: Hurley
lines: I’ll catch up! Just keep everyone else off our tail!

speaker: Magnus
lines: [loudly] What?

speaker: Hurley
lines: [louder] I’ll catch up, just keep everyone else off our tail!

speaker: Magnus
lines: [loudly] What about ketchup?

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Amused] Um, no sooner has she said that do-you see a large vehicle approaching from the dust clouds behind you. It is a long bobsled propelled by a single, huge rocket thruster, and it’s manned by four goblins- and they’re all wearing velociraptor masks. Uhh, and three of them are clutching these large, rugged looking spears. On the front of this bobspled- [sic] uh, bobsled- is a large pronged spear, uh, that is currently rocketing towards you so let’s- let’s roll initiative and I’m gonna use your guys rolls for the rest of the- the race and just sort of drop other stuff in as we go.

speaker: Travis
lines: I got 17.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Pretty good roll.

speaker: Travis
lines: Thank you.

lines: We’ll just take it- we’ll just take it as it goes like if you- I would say yeah you can fire a magic missile at a car. Can you charm a car? No.

speaker: Travis
lines: Well-

lines: Okay.

So, I'm going to levitate it, but I'm going to change the direction of the front of the vehicle, so it's just going up.

And it- it comes off the ground. And you see the driver start to like try and twist the wheel around, but it’s just sort of changing the sort of slant of the rails underneath of the car. And everybody inside starts to panic. One of the spear thrower raptors just jumps off the back. And you see his bubble, this bright blue bubble surround him as he disappears into the dust. And the- the bobsled is actually picking up speed, because it doesn't have any friction sort of stopping it anymore? Um, and the spear on the front of the car sort of leaves a supervic-- superficial gash in the, uh, in the rear of your battlewagon, very narrowly missing Magnus. As it sort of digs into that pivot point, though, the car just starts flipping and spinning wildly, and you see it disappear into the dust, throwing both of its riders, uh, into, into the storm.

That was the sixth horn. Um, and you get a little bit of dead time, until you hear this- this grinding, roaring sound coming to sort of back, and to the right of you. And out of the dust storm behind you, you see another vehicle come through. And- and before you actually see it, you see its shadow, and it's towering. It's- it’s gigantic. It's like, it's like 40 feet tall. And as it sort of makes its way out of the dust storm, you see it almost like, a single giant wheel. Like a giant wooden water wheel, almost, with these big iron rivets in it. And inside of the wheel is this static, circular chamber, and inside of that chamber are two pilots. lines: Okay, is there any room up at the top of this globe? Is there air in this globe of water?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, no. You- you got pulled in--

speaker: Travis
lines: How’d he get in it?

speaker: Griffin
lines: There was a hatch on top that he got pulled into, and then it sort of screwed itself back on.

speaker: Clint
lines: So the water goes all the way to the top?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh- yes.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Not that you can see that right now, ‘cause you got an octopus all up on your bizz.

speaker: Clint
lines: Well that’s- that’s a good point.

speaker: Travis
lines: Bite him back!

speaker: Clint
lines: I’m going to take my Warhammer, and hit myself in the face. [Travis cracks up] Thereby striking the octopus, and trusting that my thick dwarven head will keep me from killing myself.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [amused] Okay. Okay. Okay. Yeah, okay. Ah, are you using your Warhammer, or your Spanner? The-The Adamant Spanner.

speaker: Clint
lines: ...Well I don’t know what the Spanner will do. I know what my Warhammer does.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, it’s up to you.

speaker: Clint
lines: I don’t wanna hurt the Spanner.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [chuckles] That’s a good- that’s fair. Okay, so uh, first-of-all, you’re underwater, so you’re gonna have disadvantage on melee attack-

speaker: Clint
lines: I understand.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, but then, you’re gonna do a disadvantage melee attack- just one roll, and then you’re gonna compare it to your AC and the octopus’s AC.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: Hey, I lost track. Where’s Magnus?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Magnus is-

speaker: Clint, Travis, Griffin
lines: Hanging on the side.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay, great.

speaker: Travis
lines: Waiting for his turn!

speaker: Clint
lines: Thank God he has pants on this time.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay! Sixteen.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, and then roll it again? Cause you have disadvantage.

speaker: Clint
lines: Fifteen.

speaker: Griffin
lines: That includes the modifier?

speaker: Clint
lines: Plus four.

speaker: Travis
lines: So that’s nineteen.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah that’s a hit. That’s a hit on you and the octopus.

speaker: Clint
lines: Well.

speaker: Travis
lines: Now, he - technically Griffin - should roll a second time as if he was attacking two different targets.

speaker: Justin
lines: Or. Uh roll, get to roll [laughter] a constitution saving throw on himself.

speaker: Griffin
lines: No, cos he’s sort of just attacking one target. I’m not gonna allow that. He’s definitely, definitely attacking a single target. Which is his face-and-octopus.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] Alright. That’s fine. [chuckling] I knew the job was dangerous when I took it, Fred.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, so go ahead and roll damage and they’ll both take it.

speaker: Clint
lines: Three plus two.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Five. Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Actually, wait wait wait! It’s two d8 plus two.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh shit, okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: So it’s six plus two so that’s eight. On me!

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Okay, uh. On you and on the octopus. [laughing] Uh, you clobber yourself in the face.

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah you hit both--he’s--

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, but I hit him first.

speaker: Justin
lines: Well, yeah, it should be padded.

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah the padding is the octopus!

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Okay, yeah yeah! I’ll tell you what, I’ll-I’ll cut it down. I’ll roll a d4 and reduce it by...two. So you only take six. [Amused] You got a little bit of octo-padding there. Uh, it’s not enough to kill this octopus, but it does uh, loosen itself off of your face and sort of float backwards a little bit.

speaker: Clint
lines: And now I can still not breathe.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You still cannot breathe ‘cause you are underwater. Next in the order is Magnus.

speaker: Travis
lines: Um, am I within reach of the, of the grabby arm? Like, the part that’s extended out?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, yeah, you’re right next to the grabby arm that is on the-the side of- the left side of the car facing your--your wagon.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay great. I would like to uh, one-handed axe attack that please.

speaker: Griffin
lines: As you’re hanging off?

speaker: Travis
lines: You said I grabbed it with one hand.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah that’s true. I’m just--okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: Uh, fifteen...twenty-two.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Twenty-two, yeah. That’ll do it.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay. And now I would like t--

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] And you’re just sorta hacking at the, hacking the wire that it’s attached to?

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: Do I have to roll damage? Or do I just, do it?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, yeah, roll damage against the--nah, don’t do it. Yeah, you, you, you hack the thing clean off, uh--

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay, and now I would like to use my second attack to attack the tank.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: That’s thirteen plus seven, twenty!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Twenty, okay. Yeah, you uh, you attack the tank. This one I will make you roll damage on.

speaker: Travis
lines: Great. And that’s one handed so it’s one D8.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I’m also gonna make you make a strength check to keep holding onto the side of this car if you’re not gonna pull yourself up.

speaker: Travis
lines: That’s fair. I’ve got the strength of bear, baby.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: [distant] Bull. Strength of bull.

speaker: Travis
lines: Whatever, I got strength of a big ol’ thing. You know what I mean?

speaker: Clint
lines: No, don’t say that either.

speaker: Travis
lines: [laughter] Uh, that’s a five plus six, eleven damage.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Uh, you don’t shatter the tank, but you get Railsplitter in there, uh, and as you pull it back, a spray of water just sort of blasts you in the face. Uh, and uh the--

speaker: Travis
lines: It’s refreshing, I feel great.

speaker: Justin
lines: [wheezing]

speaker: Griffin
lines: And the- the water begins to leak out of the tank. Um, so now there is sort of a space up top, uh where-where there is no water. Uh next in the--

speaker: Travis
lines: Great. I’m gonna use Action Surge and hit it one more time.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, okay!

speaker: Travis
lines: Or try to. Uh, ooh, that might not do it. Um...I mean that’s only a thirteen. So that’s probably not gonna…do it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh no, that hits. It’s just-it’s just glass.

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh great.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Just barely hits.

speaker: Travis
lines: [laughing] I mean does like a two hit? Like what’s the- what’s the AC on glass?

speaker: Griffin
lines: [chuckles]

speaker: Travis
lines: Uh. I did...another five, another eleven damage.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay! This time, the crack that you put into the glass ball, uh, begins to splinter out around, uh, every sort of side of the ball. Uh, and then suddenly this ball shatters. Uh, and uh, Merle and the octopus are gonna need to make dexterity saving throws to grab onto this car, uh, as the deluge of water sort of splashes them off of the side of it.

speaker: Travis
lines: And I still need to make a strength, right?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, yeah right, so we’ll resolve that first. Go ahead Magnus, make a strength saving throw.

speaker: Travis
lines: Uhh, [distant mumbling] Well, that was a, I have advantage right? From the bull? So that first one was a thirteen.

speaker: Griffin
lines: What? No, you don’t have a - oh, yeah yeah.

speaker: Travis
lines: Strength of Bull.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, yeah.

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah. You’re welcome.

speaker: Travis
lines: Uh..okay, there we go that’s twenty four, so, probably got it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Aw man, I wanted you to fall off so bad. Uh okay-

speaker: Travis
lines: You’re a turd, that’s why.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’re still holding onto the side of the car, uh, now uh, Merle, make a dexterity saving throw as the water sort of washes you off the side of the car.

speaker: Justin
lines: You have let go of the rope at this point, right Travis? You do not have a third hand that I am not-

speaker: Travis
lines: It’s tied to me.

speaker: Justin
lines: Oh, it’s tied to you, OK, didn’t realize.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He tied himself onto the battlewagon in case he fell off.

speaker: Justin
lines: Got it.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, I rolled a sixteen.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You rolled a sixteen? Okay, yeah, you get another hand on. You basically land right next to, uh, Magnus.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Hey!

speaker: Griffin
lines: So the two of you are now hanging off of the side of the, uh, the gumball octopus wagon. Although the tank on top is shattered and then the octopus also slips off the side of the car, and he crits his dexterity saving throw! [laughter] So right next-- right next to Merle, this octopus gets two tentacles on top of the car [Theme music fades in] and is now also, hanging off the side of the car. This is the most adorable scene I’ve ever imagined. [Griffin laughs] He looks, the octopus has a very worried look in its eyes.
